Token.Abstract: The PWBuildingOverlayRenderer class defines the basic behavior associated with all building-based overlays. An overlay renderer draws the visual representation of a PWBuilding object. This class defines the drawing infrastructure used by the map view.
In order to use the temporary zoom workaround feature, a building overlay renderer needs to have a weak link to the map view using the renderer.
